official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to require that the United States Postal Service prescribe regulations relating to the delivery of mail to physically handicapped individuals.

summary.text: Directs the Postal Service to prescribe regulations for the delivery of mail to physically handicapped individuals.
